title: Interactive Information Literacy Education for Practitioners: Mathematical Data Analysis Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and experience using data visualization tools
context.additional_context: Learners are practitioners required to make data-driven decisions in fieldwork, with a collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can apply criteria to evaluate the credibility of information sources with 85% accuracy in simulation environments.
Learners can explain a multi-step (three or more) process for interpreting mathematical data analysis results through VR-based interactive tutorials.
Learners can write reports applying misinformation identification strategies to real-world cases (medical/financial fields) through gamified assessment missions.

resources: Mathematics-Based Data Analysis Sample Datasets (3 Types)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
